item.title: 12 inch pothole along the line where the slip road leaves the main road, 8th December
item.description:
Where the slip road into Bishops Cleeve leaves the main Evesham to Cheltenham Road. Has worsened considerably due to all south-bound traffic being diverted into the slip-road, during the recent closure of the main road.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Evesham Road, Bishop's Cleeve
Report on FixMyStreet
